live_updates: Services are still disrupted as Hydro outages are ongoing. Technicians are ready to ensure services are restored as quickly as possible once power is restored to an area. Further updates will continue in the morning.
Technicians are on standby to restore services once power has been restored.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39096.summary: Some customers in Shirley are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39096.title: June 29 – Shirley | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
